titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Representative Walter Beamon Jones, Jr.
A resolution honoring the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Representative Walter Beamon Jones, Jr.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution declares that the Senate honors the life, accomplishments, and legacy of Congressman Walter B. Jones, Jr., late a Representative from North Carolina, and extends its warmest sympathies to his family.
